CustomField.description: Optionally, you can multiplicatively increase the Batch Delay Upon Failure with every time a specific batch fails. E.g. if 2, the delay would increase from 10 minutes to 20, 40 etc. Alternatively, leave it at 1.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optionally, you can multiplicatively increase the Batch Delay Upon Failure with every time a specific batch fails. E.g. if 2, the delay would increase from 10 minutes to 20, 40 etc. Alternatively, leave it at 1.
CustomField.label: Batch Delay Upon Failure Multiplier
